question: [File: aptos-core/peer-monitoring-service/client/src/peer_states/key_value.rs] [Enum: PeerStateValue] [Variant mismatch] Can PeerStateValue be constructed with a variant that doesn't match the expected PeerStateKey, causing type confusion in monitoring logic? (High)
